title: anyone have spare blue essence and feeling generous enough to gift me urfwick?
body: i started maining warwick late last season (got me to platinum!) and and was stoked when i heard about the urfwick skin. i saw the recall and knew that i had to get it. i then started to play many games to attain ip to try and get this skin. In the end i fell short and was only able to make 103k so im missing 47k and i cant afford the skin. anyone feeling generous enough or just have a lot of spare essence please.

replies.body: im like 99% sure you cant gift it.
